inclusion.criterion: Women who are patients of the Loyola University Medical Center Division of Female
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Women who are 18 years and older.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: There is at least 45 minutes from the time of enrollment to the time patient is transferred to the operating room.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Women who are currently pregnant or lactating.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Women who have participated in this study before.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 34-year-old obese woman with weight concerns, sleep apnea, PCO and dissatisfaction with her body shape. She is considering a laparoscopic gastric bypass.
